channel.title: Steam RSS News Feed
channel.description: All Steam news, all the time!

item.title: Free Weekend - Fallout 4 - 67% Off
item.author: Valve
item.dc:subject: Valve news update
item.dc:creator: Valve
item.content:encoded:
Play Fallout 4 for FREE starting now through Sunday at 1PM Pacific Time. You can also pickup Fallout 4 at 67% off the regular price!*

If you already have Steam installed, click here to install or play Fallout 4. If you don't have Steam, you can download it here.

*Offer ends Monday at 10AM Pacific Time

item.title: Weekend Deal - Don't Starve, 75% Off
item.author: Valve
item.dc:subject: Valve news update
item.dc:creator: Valve
item.content:encoded:
Save up to 75% on the Don't Starve series as part of this week's Weekend Deal*!

*Offer ends Monday at 10AM Pacific Time

item.dc:creator: Valve
item.content:encoded:
Today's Deal: Save 40% on Glittermitten Grove!*

Look for the deals each day on the front page of Steam. Or follow us on twitter or Facebook for instant notifications wherever you are!

*Offer ends Saturday at 10AM Pacific Time

item.title: Now Available on Steam - SUPERHOT VR, 20% off!
item.author: Valve
item.dc:subject: Valve news update
item.dc:creator: Valve
item.content:encoded:
SUPERHOT VR is Now Available on Steam and is 20% off!*

Lose track of whatâ€™s real. Commit yourself, body and mind. Confront the evocative, elegantly brutal world of SUPERHOT VR. Enemies pouring into the room from all sides, a dozen bullets coursing through the air.... wait.



Something is different here....

*Offer ends June 1 at 10AM Pacific Time

item.title: Now Available on Steam - Vanquish
item.author: Valve
item.dc:subject: Valve news update
item.dc:creator: Valve
item.content:encoded:
Vanquish is Now Available on Steam!

PlatinumGamesâ€™ revolutionary sci-fi action shooter slide-boosts onto PC. Battle legions of future-tech enemies using a vast arsenal of weapons, including all DLC. Fully unlocked framerate and gorgeous HD resolutions up to 4K. The definitive way to play: war has accelerated.

item.title: Now Available on Steam Early Access - Planet Nomads, 10% off!
item.author: Valve
item.dc:subject: Valve news update
item.dc:creator: Valve
item.content:encoded:
Planet Nomads is Now Available on Steam Early Access and is 10% off!*

A sci-fi sandbox game of constructing your own planetary fate. Become a scientist astronaut determined to beat the odds and build great things. The particle-manipulating multitool and enviro-protec suit are your best friends on this journey.

*Offer ends June 1 at 10AM Pacific Time

item.title: Dota 2 Update - May 24th, 2017
item.author: Valve
item.dc:subject: Valve news update
item.dc:creator: Valve
item.content:encoded:
* Updated cursor images to better support high resolution displays.
* Improved the accuracy of the preview of wards blocking spawn boxes.
* Fixed the caption on Io's first talent.
* Fixed the interaction of Rubick's Spell Steal and Io's Spirits.
* Fixed a bug with Monkey King's Primal Spring and Ironwood Branches.

item.title: Now Available on Steam - Black Desert Online, 40% off!
item.author: Valve
item.dc:subject: Valve news update
item.dc:creator: Valve
item.content:encoded:
Black Desert Online is Now Available on Steam and is 40% off!*

Black Desert Online is a sandbox, living-world MMORPG. Experience fast-paced, action-packed combat, hunt monsters and huge bosses, fight with friends in a guild to siege nodes and region castles, train your life skills such as fishing, trading, crafting, cooking, and much more!

*Offer ends May 31 at 10AM Pacific Time

item.title: Now Free to Play on Steam - Awesomenauts
item.author: Valve
item.dc:subject: Valve news update
item.dc:creator: Valve
item.content:encoded:
Awesomenauts is Now Free to Play on Steam!

Conflict spans the stars as huge robot armies are locked in an enduring battle. Head out to the battlefields with your friends in this 3-on-3 action platformer. Best of all: it's completely free to play!

item.title: Now Available on Steam - Cosmic Trip, 15% off!
item.author: Valve
item.dc:subject: Valve news update
item.dc:creator: Valve
item.content:encoded:
Cosmic Trip is Now Available on Steam and is 15% off!*

Built exclusively for VR, Cosmic Trip is an award-winning real-time strategy game for the HTC Vive and Oculus Rift. Experience what itâ€™s like to command an army of badass robots and fight against hostile enemies on beautiful alien planets.

*Offer ends May 31 at 10AM Pacific Time

item.content:encoded:
Today's Deal: Save 75% on Risk of Rain!*

Look for the deals each day on the front page of Steam. Or follow us on twitter or Facebook for instant notifications wherever you are!

*Offer ends Friday at 10AM Pacific Time

item.title: Now Available on Steam - Dead Realm
item.author: Valve
item.dc:subject: Valve news update
item.dc:creator: Valve
item.content:encoded:
Dead Realm is Now Available on Steam!

Ghosts prey on the living inside the haunted mansion of a long dead electricity tycoon. Dead Realm is a creepy, multiplayer action game with beautiful, immersive environments. You can play as either a Ghost or a Human character and work with your friends to run, hide, surviveâ€¦ or die.

item.title: Midweek Madness - Hacknet, 66% Off
item.author: Valve
item.dc:subject: Valve news update
item.dc:creator: Valve
item.content:encoded:
Save 66% on Hacknet during this week's Midweek Madness*!

*Offer ends Friday at 10AM Pacific Time

item.title: Midweek Madness - Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun, 33% Off
item.author: Valve
item.dc:subject: Valve news update
item.dc:creator: Valve
item.content:encoded:
Save 33% on Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun during this week's Midweek Madness*!

Shadow Tactics is a hardcore tactical stealth game set in Japan around the Edo period.

Take control of a team of deadly specialists and sneak in the shadows between dozens of enemies. Choose your approach when infiltrating mighty castles, snowy mountain monasteries or hidden forest camps. Set traps, poison your opponents or completely avoid enemy contact.

*Offer ends Friday at 10AM Pacific Time

item.title: Grand Theft Auto V - On Sale Now, 40% off
item.author: Valve
item.dc:subject: Valve news update
item.dc:creator: Valve
item.content:encoded:
Grand Theft Auto V is on sale now!*

*Offer ends Tuesday, May 30th at 10AM Pacific Time

item.title: Now Available on Steam - Steel Division: Normandy 44
item.author: Valve
item.dc:subject: Valve news update
item.dc:creator: Valve
item.content:encoded:
Steel Division: Normandy 44 is Now Available on Steam!

Steel Division: Normandy is a tactical real-time strategy (RTS) game that pits players against AI enemies in a single-player campaign -- or against several opponents in massive 10-on-10 multiplayer battles.

item.title: Now Available on Steam - Killers and Thieves, 10% off!
item.author: Valve
item.dc:subject: Valve news update
item.dc:creator: Valve
item.content:encoded:
Killers and Thieves is Now Available on Steam and is 10% off!*

Become the leader of a medieval thieve's guild in Killers and Thieves from the co-creator of the Banner Saga series. Train a team, steal loot and master heists throughout a sprawling city to take your revenge.

*Offer ends May 30 at 10AM Pacific Time

item.title: Giveaway - Starpoint Gemini 2
item.author: Valve
item.dc:subject: Valve news update
item.dc:creator: Valve
item.content:encoded:
Get Starpoint Gemini 2 for FREE starting now until May 24th at 10AM Pacific Time! Once you add the game it will remain in your account after the free period, so don't miss out!

Captain your own space ship and roam the galaxy in 3D in this tactical space simulator with tons of RPG depth ! Space has never looked so inviting - but images can betray...It has been two years since the end of the second Gemini war, the situation in the wartorn system is further from resolution than ever.
